			has_perk = arcana_erudition_perk2_tree3
		}
		add = {
			value = 8
			desc = arcana_stress_level_value_desc
			format = "ARCANA_VALUE_FORMAT"
		}
	}
	if = {
		limit = { 
			stress_level = 3 
			has_perk = arcana_erudition_perk2_tree3
		}
		add = {
			value = 12
			desc = arcana_stress_level_value_desc
			format = "ARCANA_VALUE_FORMAT"
		}
	}
	# Modifier Bonuses

	if = {
		limit = { has_character_modifier = GH_double_synergy_diplomacy_arcana_modifier }
		add = {
			value = medium_skill_bonus
			desc = GH_double_synergy_diplomacy_arcana_bonus_value_desc
			format = "ARCANA_VALUE_FORMAT"
		}
	}
	if = {
		limit = { has_character_modifier = GH_double_synergy_martial_arcana_modifier }
		add = {
			value = medium_skill_bonus
			desc = GH_double_synergy_martial_arcana_bonus_value_desc
			format = "ARCANA_VALUE_FORMAT"
		}
	}
	if = {
		limit = { has_character_modifier = GH_double_synergy_stewardship_arcana_modifier }
		add = {
			value = medium_skill_bonus
			desc = GH_double_synergy_stewardship_arcana_bonus_value_desc
			format = "ARCANA_VALUE_FORMAT"
		}
	}
	if = {
		limit = { has_character_modifier = GH_double_synergy_intrigue_arcana_modifier }
		add = {
			value = medium_skill_bonus
			desc = GH_double_synergy_intrigue_arcana_bonus_value_desc
			format = "ARCANA_VALUE_FORMAT"
		}
	}
	if = {
		limit = { has_character_modifier = GH_double_synergy_learning_arcana_modifier }
		add = {
			value = medium_skill_bonus
			desc = GH_double_synergy_learning_arcana_bonus_value_desc
			format = "ARCANA_VALUE_FORMAT"
		}
	}
	if = {
		limit = { has_character_modifier = GH_double_synergy_arcana_arcana_modifier }
		add = {
			value = medium_skill_bonus
			desc = GH_double_synergy_arcana_bonus_value_desc
			format = "ARCANA_VALUE_FORMAT"
		}
	}

			value = medium_skill_bonus
			desc = GH_double_synergy_arcana_diplomacy_bonus_value_desc
			format = "ARCANA_VALUE_FORMAT"
		}

			desc = GH_double_synergy_arcana_intrigue_bonus_value_desc

		add = {
			value = major_skill_bonus
			desc = studying_arcana_bonus_value_desc
			format = "ARCANA_VALUE_FORMAT"
		}

			value = 1
			desc = esoterica_tutor_desc
			format = "ARCANA_VALUE_FORMAT"
		}
	}

			value = 1
			desc = esoterica_tutor_desc
			format = "ARCANA_VALUE_FORMAT"
		}
	}

		add = {
			value = 2
			desc = esoterica_tutor_desc
			format = "ARCANA_VALUE_FORMAT"
		}
	}
	if = {
		limit = { has_character_modifier = magic_general_boost }
		add = {
			value = 1
			desc = magic_general_boost
			format = "ARCANA_VALUE_FORMAT"
		}
	}
	if = {
		limit = { any_character_artifact = { has_artifact_modifier = artifact_staff_of_the_high_seer_modifier } }
		add = {
			value = 1
			desc = artifact_staff_of_the_high_seer_bonus_value_desc
			format = "ARCANA_VALUE_FORMAT"
		}
	}

		add = {
			value = 1
			desc = artifact_bane_star_ring_bonus_value_desc
			format = "ARCANA_VALUE_FORMAT"
		}
	}
	if = {
		limit = { has_character_modifier = partic_secrets_council_modifier }
		add = {
			value = 3
			desc = partic_secrets_council_modifier_desc
			format = "ARCANA_VALUE_FORMAT"
		}
	}
	if = {
		limit = { has_character_modifier = intrigue_yes_man_court_magi_modifier }
		add = {
			value = -2
			desc = intrigue_yes_man_court_magi_modifier
			format = "ARCANA_VALUE_FORMAT"
		}
	}
	if = {
		limit = { has_character_modifier = intrigue_trusty_court_magi_modifier }
		add = {
			value = 2
			desc = intrigue_trusty_court_magi_modifier
			format = "ARCANA_VALUE_FORMAT"
		}
	}
	if = {
		limit = { has_character_modifier = intrigue_doing_court_magis_job_modifier }
		add = {
			value = 2
			desc = intrigue_doing_court_magis_job_modifier
			format = "ARCANA_VALUE_FORMAT"
		}
	}
	if = {
		limit = { has_character_modifier = landless_local_arbitration_beast_hunters_modifier }
		add = {
			value = 2
			desc = landless_local_arbitration_beast_hunters_modifier
			format = "ARCANA_VALUE_FORMAT"
		}
	}
	if = {
		limit = { has_character_modifier = landless_local_arbitration_wanderers_modifier }
		add = {
			value = 1
			desc = landless_local_arbitration_wanderers_modifier
			format = "ARCANA_VALUE_FORMAT"
		}
	}
	min = 0
	floor = yes
}

character_creation_arcana_baseline_value = {
	value = 0
	if = {
		limit = { exists = var:arcana }
		add = {
			value = var:arcana
			desc = base_value_desc
		}
	}
	if = {
		limit = { 
			is_target_in_variable_list = {
				name = selected_trait_list
				target = flag:lifestyle_hunter
			}
		}
		add = {
			value = lifestyle_hunter_character_arcana_value
			desc = "[GetTrait('lifestyle_hunter').GetName( GetNullCharacter )]"
		}
	}
	if = {
		limit = { 
			is_target_in_variable_list = {
				name = selected_trait_list
				target = flag:torturer
			}
		}
		add = {
			value = torturer_character_arcana_value
			desc = "[GetTrait('torturer').GetName( GetNullCharacter )]"
		}
	}
	if = {
		limit = { 
			is_target_in_variable_list = {
				name = selected_trait_list
				target = flag:scholar
			}
		}
		add = {
			value = scholar_character_arcana_value
			desc = "[GetTrait('scholar').GetName( GetNullCharacter )]"
		}
	}
	if = {
		limit = { 
			is_target_in_variable_list = {
				name = selected_trait_list
				target = flag:lifestyle_mystic
			}
		}
		add = {
			value = lifestyle_mystic_character_arcana_value
			desc = "[GetTrait('lifestyle_mystic').GetName( GetNullCharacter )]"
		}
	}
	if = {

			is_target_in_variable_list = {
				name = selected_trait_list
				target = flag:lifestyle_physician
			}
		}
		add = {
			value = lifestyle_physician_character_arcana_value
			desc = "[GetTrait('lifestyle_physician').GetName( GetNullCharacter )]"
		}
	}
	if = {

				name = selected_trait_list
				target = flag:lifestyle_herbalist
			}
		}
		add = {

		}
	}
	if = {
		limit = { 
			is_target_in_variable_list = {
				name = selected_trait_list
				target = flag:gh_blackspawn_2
			}
		}
		add = {
			value = gh_blackspawn_2_character_arcana_value
			desc = "[GetTrait('gh_blackspawn_2').GetName( GetNullCharacter )]"
		}
	}
	if = {
		limit = { 
			is_target_in_variable_list = {
				name = selected_trait_list
				target = flag:gh_blackspawn_3
			}
		}
		add = {
			value = gh_blackspawn_3_character_arcana_value
			desc = "[GetTrait('gh_blackspawn_3').GetName( GetNullCharacter )]"
		}
	}
	if = {
		limit = { 
			is_target_in_variable_list = {
				name = selected_trait_list
				target = flag:gh_blackspawn_4
			}
		}
		add = {
			value = gh_blackspawn_4_character_arcana_value
			desc = "[GetTrait('gh_blackspawn_4').GetName( GetNullCharacter )]"
		}
	}
	if = {
		limit = { 
			is_target_in_variable_list = {
				name = selected_trait_list
				target = flag:gh_blackspawn_5
			}
		}
		add = {
			value = gh_blackspawn_5_character_arcana_value
			desc = "[GetTrait('gh_blackspawn_5').GetName( GetNullCharacter )]"
		}
	}
	if = {
		limit = { 
			is_target_in_variable_list = {
				name = selected_trait_list
				target = flag:lifestyle_one_with_nature
			}
		}
		add = {
			value = lifestyle_one_with_nature_character_arcana_value
			desc = "[GetTrait('lifestyle_one_with_nature').GetName( GetNullCharacter )]"
		}
	}
	floor = yes
}

arcana = {
	value = 0
	add = {
		value = character_arcana_baseline_value
		desc = arcana_base_value_desc
	}
	floor = yes
}
